format.question: What file formats are supported?
format.answer: You can upload JPG, PNG, and WEBP. Generated images are high-resolution PNGs.

privacy.question: Are my sketches safe?

credits.question: What happens when I run out of credits?

general.title: 1. Scope
general.text: These Terms of Service apply to all services provided by Draw to Media. By using our services, you accept these terms.

usage.title: 2. Usage Terms
usage.text: Generated images may be used for private and commercial purposes. Use for illegal or ethically questionable purposes is prohibited.

credits.title: 3. Credits and Payment
credits.text: Credits are credited immediately after successful payment. Once purchased, credits are non-refundable. Credits do not expire.

liability.title: 4. Liability
liability.text: We are not liable for damages arising from the use of generated images. AI generation may produce unpredictable results.

collection.title: 1. Data Collection
collection.text: We only collect data necessary for providing our service: email address for authentication and uploaded images for processing.

usage.title: 2. Data Usage
usage.text: Your data is used exclusively to provide our services. We do not sell or share your data with third parties.

storage.title: 3. Data Storage
storage.text: Uploaded images are securely stored in the EU. Generated images remain available in your account until you delete them.

rights.title: 4. Your Rights
rights.text: You have the right to access, correct, and delete your data. Contact us for such requests.

cookies.title: 5. Cookies
cookies.text: We only use technically necessary cookies for authentication. No tracking cookies are used.
